issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

g1 running 1.6 and the sim running 2.2 Ti Mobile sdk 1.5.0.02c264.

1.Phone>Orientation
2.change orientation and check out the label that is reporting orientation

results: current orientation is not being returned

3.Use the buttons to set orientation

results: fail silently

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Orientation - currentOrientation is not being returned correctly, unable to use buttons to change orientation

comments.body:
{html}

This goes along with implementing orientation using currentActivity.

{html}

{html}

(from [ca266ee6bf672262eddf6b2b0e8b2143027b9ee5]) better support for orientationModes in android. we now use OrientationEventListener along with setRequestedOrientation to manage when we forcefully override / control orientation. the android API doesn't expose "landscape left", so we won't be able to support it orientationModes until they do. expose the current context in the invocation for dynamic properties instead of the proxy context. fixes and code cleanup for the Gesture module [#2069 state:fixed-in-qa] [#1045] https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/ca266ee6bf67...

{html}
